name: Garden Grower
summary:
Free to play
In the hilly landscape known as Northleaf Hills, you buy a small plot of land, inwhich you decide to begin to build a garden. Buy flowers and paths to shape the garden however you like. Collect daily gold, watch some ads, or buy some in app purchases to upgrade your level, to unlock more flowers. Reach the ultimate level 20, as you strive to complete your garden. Watch your garden grow, as you plant more and more flowers. With updates to the game coming soon, sure to bring more flowers, trees and visitors to your garden, you'll never be able to stop the fun in your garden!
